name: Stretched Wings
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Strix/New Racial Rules/Strix Feats/Stretched Wings

sections.body: Str 13, Skill Focus (Fly), strix, wing-clipped racial trait.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: Your strix racial fly speed increases to 60 feet (average). You ignore the wing-clipped trait's Fly check requirement to fly upward.
sections.name: Benefit
